## Checklist

### Files

- [ ] Documents placed in correct directory: `documents/<format>/<group>/`
- [ ] File names are descriptive and follow conventions
- [ ] All binary files (DOCX, ODT, PDF, etc.) are tracked by Git LFS

### Attribution

- [ ] Added entry to `ATTRIBUTION.json` with all required fields
- [ ] Ran `./bin/generate-attribution.sh` to update `ATTRIBUTION.md`

### Licensing

- [ ] Documents are openly licensed (CC0, CC-BY, GPL, MIT, Apache, BSD, etc.)
- [ ] License permits redistribution and derivative works
- [ ] Attribution information is accurate and complete
- [ ] I have the right to share these documents under their stated licenses

### Quality

- [ ] Documents are complete and not corrupted
- [ ] No sensitive or confidential information included
